attributes.name: Biodiversity
attributes.description: Impact of projects on biodiversity conservation, calculated from indicators of endemism, land conservation/restoration, connectivity, and development of sustainable social projects.

attributes.name: Climate
attributes.description: Impact of projects that reduce carbon emissions from the land sector (deforestation/degradation), as wood and soil biomass as well as application of sustainable forest measures.

attributes.name: Water
attributes.description: Impact of projects managing water cycling, quality and availability as well as the management of associated risks.

attributes.name: Community
attributes.description: Impact of projects on ensuring and improving equal and inclusive physical, mental, economic, and spiritual health.
